abstract: Is Bloomberg about to bust out of the terminal and go after Dow Jones?
snippet: Is Bloomberg about to bust out of the terminal and go after Dow Jones?
lead_paragraph: Most Americans think of Bloomberg as a short, self-financed municipal overlord of New York, while traders think of it as a box on their desktop, but if the media company that bears his name has anything to say about it, that will be changing in the near future.

headline.main: Bloomberg Makes a Move or Two. Will War Break Out with Dow Jones?
